flawed_nl_solution:
He consumes 2500+1000=<<2500+1000=3510>>3510 calories on Saturday
He consumes 2500*6+3510=<<2500*6+3510=18510>>18510 calories in the week.
He burns 3000*7=<<3000*7=21000>>21000 calories in the week
His caloric deficit is 21000-18510=<<21000-18510=2490>>2490 calories per week

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3500, not 3510. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
